title: 105_hr3622
content: Empowerment Zone Enhancement Act of 1998 - Amends title XX of the Social Security Act with respect to additional grants to: (1) provide for grant funding for additional empowerment zones. (2) set the amount of such grants for zones in urban and rural areas, as well as the timing of such grants, (3) provide funding for such grants. (4) require environmental review by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development and the Secretary of Agriculture. And (5) require the lead implementing entity for an empowerment zone to establish a performance measurement system.
